articles.author: Simone McCarthy, Tenzin Dharpo, Laura Sharman
articles.title: Dalai Lama marks his 90th birthday as crowds throng his home-in-exile - CNN
articles.description: Thousands of people gathered in India’s Dharamshala on Sunday to celebrate the 90th birthday of the Dalai Lama – a key milestone in the life of the spiritual leader and Nobel Peace laureate known for his message of compassion and his quest for greater freedom…
articles.content:
